page.title: 16LIFESTYLE IN WOODLAND 2
page.content: { Secondary School}children wear a uniform for school.Girls uniform is blue, boys wear blue with black trousers.Leisure wear are old trousers mostly jeans.There are 3 people in the village who are unusual because of the way they dress.They are called 'punk', their hair is spiked and is dyed bright colours.Normal hair styles for girls is long hair and for boys short hair. The{Primary School}has no uniform. Most girls wear blouse and skirt or dresses.Most boys wear jeans or long trousers a few boys wear short trousers. Girls mostly have long hair.Boys have short hair. Most{popular groups}are Wham!,Duran Duran and Sister Sledge. There is a{Leisure Centre}at Bishop Auckland and one with skating at Darlington.
